categories: Category:Commerce and labor guilds and unions

nodes.text: The Galactic Podracing Mechanics Union was an organization active during the final decades of the Galactic Republic, with which the Ugnaught engineer and criminal Onicrop K'Cin was associated.

The Galactic Podracing Mechanics Union was fist mentioned in the video game Star Wars: Bounty Hunter released by LucasArts in 2002. The union was mentioned in the e-scanner bounty entry for Onicrop K'cin, a secondary bounty available during the second level of the first chapter.
